name: Portuguese Seed Association
headAddress: Rua da Junqueira n.º 39 - Ed. Rosa - 1º Piso
goal:
Representation
of its members (seed companies active in Portugal), before the Portuguese official services (Ministries of Agriculture and Environment) and the EU organizations;

Information
to the members about all the regulamentary issues that cover the seed Sector;

Communication
to stakholders and the society in general about the Sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
- Organic farming Regulation;
- REFIT evaluation of EU pesticide legislation;
- EU's strategy on adaptation to climate change;
- EU implementation of the Nagoya Protocol.
